DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research assess role non-contrast helical computerize tomogram predict treatment outcome upper ureteric stone extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy ( ESWL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study 'The Use Non-contrast Helical Computerized Tomogram Predicting Treatment Outcomes Upper Ureteric Stone Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy Using Sonolith 4000+ Lithotripter '
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( > 18 year old ) With solitary upper ureteric stone ( define ureter sacroiliac joint see plain radiography ) diagnose NCHCT * ( * stone site indexed stone solitary stone ) Size 5 15 mm maximal diameter measure plain radiography . Planned primary insitu ESWL Patient contraindicate ESWL active urosepsis , coagulopathy , pregnant lady etc Presence percutaneous nephrostomy ureteric stent Suspected distal obstruction
